Package agh.alleviation.stats

Class TimeStats

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.GenericController
agh.alleviation.stats.GenericStats<java.time.LocalTime>
agh.alleviation.stats.TimeStats
public class TimeStats
extends GenericStats<java.time.LocalTime>
Class responsible for generation of time statistics and update of the statistics table.
Author:
Ksenia Fiodarava
See Also:
GenericStats, StatisticsController
